Package org.projecthusky.communication.ch.ppq.epr.policyadmin.api

Interface OpenSamlUpdatePolicyRequest

All Superinterfaces:
AssertionBasedRequest, BasePolicyAdministration, OpenSamlAssertionBasedRequest, UpdatePolicyRequest, org.opensaml.core.xml.XMLObject
All Known Implementing Classes:
UpdatePolicyRequestImpl
public interface OpenSamlUpdatePolicyRequest extends UpdatePolicyRequest, OpenSamlAssertionBasedRequest
Extending interface to integrate UpdatePolicyRequest interface to opensaml implementation.
Erweiterndes Interface um das UpdatePolicyRequest Interface in OpenSAML Implementation zu integrieren.
